subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|鹿|土|ls=ic|t1=deer|t2=soil, dust}} – cloud of dust produced by a (group of) running deer. Ancient simplification of {{och-l|𪋻}}, which pictures three deer on top instead of one.

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[dust]]; [[dirt]]; [[ashes]]; [[cinders]]
#: {{zh-x|吸塵器|vacuum cleaner}}
# to be [[streaked]] with [[dirt]]; to become [[stained]]
# [[trace]]; [[footprint]]
# {{lb|zh|figurative}} [[dirty]] thing
# {{lb|zh|figurative}} [[war]]; [[warfare]]
# {{lb|zh|Buddhism}} [[this]] [[world]]; [[mundane]] world; this [[mortal]] [[life]]
# {{lb|zh|Buddhism}} the number [[billionth]] (10<sup>–9</sup>)
# for a [[long]] [[time]]
# {{surname|lang=zh}}
